turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order for 3 pizzas at La Casa Pizzaria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Which La Casa location would you like to order your pizza from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The south location, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will you be picking up your pizza or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be picking it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What types of pizza would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2 hamburger pizzas, and 1 pepperoni, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. When would you like to pick these pizzas up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How would you like to pay for your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pay with cash when I arrive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Will you be ordering anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I may want some drinks. What do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: La Casa has Pepsi products and several brands of beer.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they carry Diet Mountain Dew?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they have Diet Mountain Dew in 2 liter bottles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Please add 1 2 liter bottle of Diet Mountain Dew to my order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is there anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your total will be $57, and your order will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
